Dashboard.title: Command Center
Dashboard.subtitle: Welcome Captain. Systems are online.
Dashboard.seo_desc: Your company's financial status and active projects.

Landing.seo_desc: Manage proposals, customers, and finances from a single AI-powered dashboard.
Landing.hero_subtitle: AI-powered proposal creation, smart project management, and financial tracking. Manage all your business processes from a single platform.
Landing.trusted_subtitle: Industry-leading companies grow with Unalisi OS
Landing.features_subtitle: All the tools modern businesses need, in one platform.
Landing.feature_ai_desc: GPT-4 powered smart proposal creation, automated email writing, and AI that optimizes your business processes.
Landing.feature_crm_desc: Professionally manage your customer relationships. Communication history, notes, and reminders in one screen.
Landing.feature_finance_desc: Keep track of your business with income-expense tracking, invoice management, and detailed financial reports.
Landing.feature_projects_desc: Deliver your projects on time with Kanban boards, timelines, and task tracking.
Landing.feature_contracts_desc: Stay secure with digital contracts, e-signature integration, and automatic reminders.
Landing.feature_analytics_desc: Real-time reports, customizable dashboards, and data-driven decision-making tools.
Landing.how_subtitle: Set up the system in minutes and start managing your business.
Landing.how_step1_desc: Fill out the quick registration form and create your account instantly.
Landing.how_step2_desc: Easily import your existing customer and project data.
Landing.how_step3_desc: Start managing all your business processes from a single dashboard.
Landing.pricing_title: The Right Plan for Your Business
Landing.pricing_subtitle: Flexible pricing options for businesses of all sizes.
Landing.testimonials_subtitle: Success stories from businesses using Unalisi OS.
Landing.testimonial_1_text: Our customer management has become much more efficient with Unalisi OS. The AI-powered proposal creation feature saves tremendous time.
Landing.testimonial_2_text: The financial reporting features are incredible. We can now track our business status in real-time.
Landing.testimonial_3_text: Managing our projects with Kanban boards increased our team productivity by 40%. Highly recommended.
Landing.faq_subtitle: Find answers to your questions here.
Landing.faq_1_a: Yes! We offer a 14-day free trial on all our plans. No credit card required.
Landing.faq_2_a: Absolutely. All data is protected with AES-256 encryption and stored in our GDPR-compliant infrastructure.
Landing.faq_3_q: Can I import data from my existing system?
Landing.faq_3_a: Yes, we provide easy data import from Excel, CSV, and popular CRM systems.
Landing.faq_4_a: Yes, our mobile app is available for iOS and Android. Access all features from your mobile device.
Landing.faq_5_a: Starter plan includes email support, Professional plan has priority support, and Enterprise plan offers 24/7 phone and video support.
Landing.cta_section_subtitle: Join thousands of businesses growing with Unalisi OS.
Landing.cta_section_note: 14-day free trial â€¢ No credit card required
Landing.footer_desc: Next-gen business management platform. Handle proposals, customers, finance, and project management from a single dashboard.

Team.title: Team Management
Team.subtitle: Manage your organization members.
Team.invite_desc: Add a new member to your organization.
Team.email_hint: Enter the email address of a registered user.
Team.invite_warning_text: The user you want to invite must be registered in the system. The ability to invite unregistered users will be added soon.
Team.user_not_found: No user found with this email address.
Team.user_not_found_desc: Ask the person you want to invite to register first, then try again.

Organization.title: Organization Settings
Organization.subtitle: Manage your organization's basic settings.
Organization.name: Organization Name
Organization.slug_taken: This URL shortcut is already in use
Organization.slug_hint: Only lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens allowed
Organization.logo_hint: Enter a URL for the logo image (recommended: 256x256px)
Organization.create_org_desc: Create a new workspace and invite your team.
Organization.create_org_info_title: When you create a new organization:
Organization.create_org_info_1: You will be automatically added as Owner
Organization.create_org_info_2: You will be switched to the new workspace immediately
Organization.create_org_info_3: You can invite team members later
Organization.subscription_note: Subscription management will be available soon.
Organization.danger_zone_desc: These actions cannot be undone. Be careful.
Organization.access_denied_desc: You need admin or owner permissions to view this page.
